segue_the_chain: The lyrics to Mrs Robinson and This Charming Man both contain the word ‘pantry’…

segue_dave.line: Simon & Garfunkel have made rock music, and The Jam recorded music of the same genre...
segue_dave.explanation: Simon & Garfunkel have made music identifiable with the musical genre: rock music, while The Jam have made music belonging to the musical genre: rock music
